hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de tourisme Bretagne Côte de Granit Rose

de:
Port-Blanc ist ein einzigartiges, sicheres und durch eine Inselgruppe geschütztes Gewässer, das unterschiedliche Segelreviere schafft: Zwischen der Lagune und dem Wellengang hinter der "Ile du Château" ist die Auswahl einfach, um alle Segler zufrieden zu stellen. Wählen Sie einen Anfänger- oder Fortgeschrittenenkurs, der Ihren Erwartungen entspricht, von 4 bis 97 Jahren und zu einem erschwinglichen Preis.
Vélektros Charter.
en:
The Port-Blanc Penvenan Municipal Water-sports Centre was created in July 1961 by Pierre Furet (it was then known as a 'sailing school'), and is located right in the heart of the Cotes des Ajoncs (Gorse Coast). We provide sailing and kayaking opportunities. 
The water here is unique, safe and sheltered by an archipelago of 12 isles and islets.  

We provide various tuition packages (usually 5 half-days) depending on age or your wishes. Training is provided by qualified, attentive male and female instructors.


For children aged 4 to 8: the 'jardin des mers' children's club, where children can explore the marine environment, enjoy shellfish gathering and sea fishing, and visit the islands as well as learning the first rules of sailing.    
                                                                                                

For ages 7 to 12: the Beginner Bug and the Improver Bug, little two or one-man sailing dinghies. These little 2.35m boats are perfect for getting to grips with basic sailing techniques and understanding how the wind works.      

For ages 10 and over, various possibilities are available:  
-modern two-man sailing dinghies (a 3.90m VIBE and a 4.20m VAGO ), whose technical handling can increase as the crew’s technical ability improves. Asymmetric spinnaker. 
- catamarans (twin hull), the Twin cat 13, the Hobie Teddy and the Twincat 15 Xtreme, boats suitable for beginners (Hobie Teddy), and more technically demanding boats (Twincat) for sailors looking for speed and fun for the whole crew. 
- for windsurfers, new boards (2012), which - depending on size - will meet the needs of all learners, with size-adapted sails so that good progress can be made (wetsuits provided). 
- the First Class 8: a small cruiser (8m) for day trips or for mini courses lasting 3 half days, you will get a chance to learn crew sailing, handling and manoeuvring to enter port with a small crew. 
- sea kayaks, our most recently acquired craft, are an opportunity for you to explore the isles and islets at your own pace and all the beauty they have to offer (pebble strands, lagoons and fine sandy beaches, etc). 
In addition raids and trips out in catamarans, dinghies and sea kayaks are available, depending on student abilities. 
Rates for a 5 half-day course start at €97 for sailing and €51 for 4 half-days in a sea kayak.
it:
Port-Blanc è uno specchio d'acqua unico, sicuro e riparato, protetto da un arcipelago che crea diversi siti di navigazione: tra la laguna e l'insidia dietro l'Ile du Château, la scelta è semplice per soddisfare tutti i velisti. Scegliete un corso per principianti o avanzato in base alle vostre esigenze, dai 4 ai 97 anni, a un prezzo accessibile.
Affitti di Velektros.
fr:
Port-Blanc est un plan d'eau unique, sécurisé et abrité par un archipel qui crée des sites de navigation différents : entre le lagon et le clapot derrière "l'Ile du Château", le choix est simple pour contenter tous les navigateurs. Choisissez un stage initiation ou perfectionnement répondant à vos attentes, de 4 à 97 ans pour un tarif abordable.
Locations de Vélektros.
nl:
Port-Blanc is een uniek, veilig en beschut stuk water, beschut door een archipel die verschillende vaargebieden creëert: tussen de lagune en de chop achter het "Ile du Château" is de keuze eenvoudig om alle zeilers tevreden te stellen. Kies een cursus voor beginners of gevorderden, van 4 tot 97 jaar, tegen een betaalbare prijs.
Huren van Velektros.
es:
Port-Blanc es un tramo de agua único, seguro y resguardado, al abrigo de un archipiélago que crea diferentes lugares de navegación: entre la laguna y el chop detrás de la "Ile du Château", la elección es sencilla para satisfacer a todos los navegantes. Elige un curso de iniciación o de perfeccionamiento que se adapte a tus necesidades, de 4 a 97 años, a un precio asequible.
Alquileres de Velektros.
